  • ValueSet DocumentReference Category

    • This is the Continuous Integration Build of the Argonaut Clinical Notes Implementation Guide, based on FHIR Version 3.0.1. See the Directory of published versions

    • Narrative Content
    • XML
    • JSON

    XML Format: ValueSet-documentreference-category

    Raw xml 

    
<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="documentreference-category"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>Argonaut DocumentReferences Category Value Set</h2><div><p>The Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.</p>
</div><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include all codes defined in <a href="CodeSystem-documentreference-category.html"><code>http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/CodeSystem/documentreference-category</code></a></li></ul></div>
  </text>
  <url
       value="http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/ValueSet/documentreference-category"/>
  <version value="0.0.0"/>
  <name value="Argonaut DocumentReference Category Codes"/>
  <title value="Argonaut DocumentReferences Category Value Set"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <date value="2018-05-02T08:16:34-07:00"/>
  <description
               value="The Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a &#39;starter set&#39; of categories supported for fetching and storing clinical notes."/>
  <jurisdiction>
    <coding>
      <system value="urn:iso:std:iso:3166"/>
      <code value="US"/>
      <display value="United States of America"/>
    </coding>
  </jurisdiction>
  <compose>
    <include>
      <system
              value="http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/CodeSystem/documentreference-category"/>
    </include>
  </compose>
</ValueSet>
